<script>
import { Line, mixins } from 'vue-chartjs'
const { reactiveProp } = mixins;

export default {
  extends: Line,
  mixins: [ reactiveProp],
  props: {
    range: Array,
    selectable: Boolean,
    options: Object,
    chartData: Object
  },
  data: () => ({
    drag: false,
  }),
  mounted () {
    // this.addPlugin({

    //     //     return (number + Math.floor(2 * Math.round((num - number) * Math.pow(10, (scale + 1))) / 10) / Math.pow(10, scale));

    //     if(chart.getDatasetMeta(0) && chart.data.datasets[0].backgroundColor.length && chart.data.datasets[0].borderColor.length) {
    //       const ctx = chart.ctx;
    //       const meta = chart.getDatasetMeta(0);
    //       const points = meta.data || [];
    //       if (points.length === 0) {
    //         return
    //       }
    //       const {left, right} = chart.chartArea;
    //       const dataset = chart.data.datasets[0];
    //       const linearGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(left, 0, right, 0);
    //       const borderlinearGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(left, 0, right, 0);
    //       const colors = dataset.backgroundColor;
    //       //const border = dataset.borderColor;
    //       let numberofpoints = points.length-1;
    //       let distance = points[0]._model.controlPointNextX - points[0]._model.x
    //
    //       points.forEach(function(point, i) {
    //         //let colorStopPosition = roundNumber((point._model.x - left) / (right - left), 2);
    //         //let colorStopPosition = (point._model.x - left-1) / (right - left - 3)
    //         let colorStopPosition = (distance*i)/(distance*numberofpoints)
    //         if(colorStopPosition>1) colorStopPosition=1;
    //         if(colorStopPosition<0) colorStopPosition=1;
    //         if (i === 0) {
    //           linearGradient.addColorStop(colorStopPosition, colors[i+1]);
    //           //borderlinearGradient.addColorStop(colorStopPosition, border[i+1]);
    //
    //         }
    //
    //         if(i >= 1 && i < (points.length-1)) {
    //           linearGradient.addColorStop(colorStopPosition, colors[i]);
    //           linearGradient.addColorStop(colorStopPosition, colors[i+1]);
    //
    //           borderlinearGradient.addColorStop(colorStopPosition, colors[i]);
    //           //borderlinearGradient.addColorStop(colorStopPosition, border[i+1]);
    //
    //         }
    //
    //         if(i == points.length-1) {
    //           linearGradient.addColorStop(colorStopPosition, colors[i]);
    //           linearGradient.addColorStop(colorStopPosition, colors[i]);
    //
    //           //borderlinearGradient.addColorStop(colorStopPosition, border[i]);
    //           //borderlinearGradient.addColorStop(colorStopPosition, border[i]);
    //         }
    //       });
    //       dataset.backgroundColor = linearGradient;
    //       dataset.borderColor = borderlinearGradient;
    //       meta.dataset._model.borderColor = borderlinearGradient;
    //       meta.dataset._model.backgroundColor = linearGradient;
    //     }}
    // })
    this.renderChart(this.chartData, this.options)
    this.$emit('chartobject',this.$data._chart)
//    this.$data._chart.canvas.addEventListener('wheel', this.scroll);


  },
  destroyed() {



//    this.$data._chart.canvas.removeEventListener('wheel', this.scroll);

  },
  methods: {
    // scroll(e) {
    //   let relativepos = this.$data._chart.getElementsAtXAxis(e)[0]._index/this.$data._chart.config.data.datasets[0].data.length;
    //
    //   if(!this.drag && this.$data._chart.config.data.datasets[0].data.length > 30) {
    //
    //     if (e.deltaY > 0) {
    //       if (relativepos > 0.50) {
    //         console.log('a')
    //         let range = [this.range[0]-1,this.range[1]]
    //         this.$emit('setrange',range);
    //       }
    //       else if (relativepos < 0.50) {
    //         console.log('b')
    //
    //         let range = [this.range[0],this.range[1]-1]
    //         this.$emit('setrange',range);
    //       }
    //     } else {
    //       if (relativepos > 0.50) {
    //         console.log('c')
    //
    //         let range = [this.range[0]+1,this.range[1]]
    //         this.$emit('setrange',range);
    //       }
    //       else if (relativepos < 0.50) {
    //         console.log('d')
    //
    //         let range = [this.range[0],this.range[1]+1]
    //         this.$emit('setrange',range);
    //       }
    //     }
    //   }
    // },
    start(e) {
      this.$emit('chartobject',this.$data._chart)
      this.$emit('start',e,this.$data._chart.getElementsAtXAxis(e)[0])
    },
    movement(e) {
//      if (this.drag) {
        //this.$emit('chartobject',this.$data._chart)
        this.$emit('movement',e,this.drag,this.$data._chart.getElementsAtXAxis(e)[0])
//      }
    },
    stop() {
      this.$emit('stop')
      this.drag = false;
      this.$data._chart.canvas.removeEventListener('pointerdown', this.handleclick);
      this.$data._chart.canvas.removeEventListener('pointermove', this.movement);
      this.$data._chart.canvas.removeEventListener('pointerup', this.stop);

    },
  },
  watch: {
    selectable(newval) {
      if(newval) {
        this.$emit('chartobject',this.$data._chart)
        this.drag = true;
        this.$data._chart.canvas.addEventListener('pointerdown', this.start);
        this.$data._chart.canvas.addEventListener('pointermove', this.movement);
        this.$data._chart.canvas.addEventListener('pointerup', this.stop);
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
</style>
